argumentText:
ARGUMENT
k

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isatlat.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | isatlat.g | |- G = ( glb ` K ) |
| 3 |  | isatlat.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 4 |  | isatlat.z | |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) |
| 5 |  | isatlat.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( Base ` k ) = ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 7 | 6, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( k = K -> ( Base ` k ) = B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( glb ` k ) = ( glb ` K ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( k = K -> ( glb ` k ) = G ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( k = K -> dom ( glb ` k ) = dom G ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eleq12d | |- ( k = K -> ( ( Base ` k ) e. dom ( glb ` k ) <-> B e. dom G ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( 0. ` k ) = ( 0. ` K ) ) |
| 13 | 12, 4 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( k = K -> ( 0. ` k ) = .0. ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_neeq2d | |- ( k = K -> ( x =/= ( 0. ` k ) <-> x =/= .0. ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( Atoms ` k ) = ( Atoms ` K ) ) |
| 16 | 15, 5 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( k = K -> ( Atoms ` k ) = A ) |
| 17 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( le ` k ) = ( le ` K ) ) |
| 18 | 17, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( k = K -> ( le ` k ) = .<_ ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_breqd | |- ( k = K -> ( y ( le ` k ) x <-> y .<_ x ) ) |
| 20 | 16, 19 | #P_rexeqbidv | |- ( k = K -> ( E. y e. ( Atoms ` k ) y ( le ` k ) x <-> E. y e. A y .<_ x ) ) |
| 21 | 14, 20 | #P_imbi12d | |- ( k = K -> ( ( x =/= ( 0. ` k ) -> E. y e. ( Atoms ` k ) y ( le ` k ) x ) <-> ( x =/= .0. -> E. y e. A y .<_ x ) ) ) |
| 22 | 7, 21 | #P_raleqbidv | |- ( k = K -> ( A. x e. ( Base ` k ) ( x =/= ( 0. ` k ) -> E. y e. ( Atoms ` k ) y ( le ` k ) x ) <-> A. x e. B ( x =/= .0. -> E. y e. A y .<_ x ) ) ) |
| 23 | 11, 22 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( k = K -> ( ( ( Base ` k ) e. dom ( glb ` k ) /\ A. x e. ( Base ` k ) ( x =/= ( 0. ` k ) -> E. y e. ( Atoms ` k ) y ( le ` k ) x ) ) <-> ( B e. dom G /\ A. x e. B ( x =/= .0. -> E. y e. A y .<_ x ) ) ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_df-atl | |- AtLat = { k e. Lat | ( ( Base ` k ) e. dom ( glb ` k ) /\ A. x e. ( Base ` k ) ( x =/= ( 0. ` k ) -> E. y e. ( Atoms ` k ) y ( le ` k ) x ) ) } |
| 25 | 23, 24 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( K e. AtLat <-> ( K e. Lat /\ ( B e. dom G /\ A. x e. B ( x =/= .0. -> E. y e. A y .<_ x ) ) ) ) |
| 26 |  | #P_3anass | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ B e. dom G /\ A. x e. B ( x =/= .0. -> E. y e. A y .<_ x ) ) <-> ( K e. Lat /\ ( B e. dom G /\ A. x e. B ( x =/= .0. -> E. y e. A y .<_ x ) ) ) ) |
| 27 | 25, 26 | #P_bitr4i | |- ( K e. AtLat <-> ( K e. Lat /\ B e. dom G /\ A. x e. B ( x =/= .0. -> E. y e. A y .<_ x ) ) ) |
